pullRequest.title: avoid polluting local repository
pullRequest.bodyText:
fixes #1301
This injects a local repository into the graph builder from the test, so we avoid installing any artifacts into ~.m2
Suggestions for making this less hacky appreciated.

nodes.bodyText: I think setting we want to set the maven directory in createDefaultRepositorySystemSession to keep the returned session read-only.
Now this test passes. Thank you.

commit.message: remove use of @Beta Guava method and expand JavaDoc
